Xero Verify

Brief: Xero Verify is the dedicated two-factor authentication app for securing your Xero account. Offering an additional layer of security through push notifications and six-digit verification codes, the app ensures that only you can access your financial data on Xeroâ€”anytime, anywhere, even offline.

  • ğŸŒ Offline Access: Access six-digit codes without needing a network or mobile connection.
